entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
